TowerDefenseMonster.8070020.1: Keeps speeding up while rolling. The speed-up stops after being inflicted with a control effect.
TowerDefenseMonster.8079902.1: Keeps speeding up while rolling. Resets after being inflicted with a control effect.
TowerDefenseMonster.8089901.1: Grants a speed boost to all nearby allies. Must be eliminated first.
